author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Peter Goron : Migrate webtools debug level screens to widget and add dynamic configuration of log4j loggers (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-361)
I did not have a lot of time to test this patch (after a quick review I only switched some interactiv debug levels). It seems well done and very interesting.
